items.sentence: I'll lend you my bicycle if you promise not to let anyone else ride it.
It's a lot easier to paddle a canoe downstream than to paddle upstream.
It was interesting to learn about all the various types of baking soda.
Tom bought a new kind of pasta from the store to spice things up a bit.
Tom is having a big party at his house. He invited Mary and me to come.
Tom is one of the funniest and most interesting people I have ever met.
I'd rather be poor and happy than be rich doing something I don't like.
This is the same motorcycle that was left at the scene of the accident.
I don't care if the rest of the world forgets me, as long as you don't.
It's unlikely anyone other than Tom would be interested in buying this.
